channel.title: Port forwarding and no-ip questions
channel.description:
I'm trying to port forward, but from the port forwarding something isn't clearly to me [b]1)[/b]
Inbound port Private port
[i]these two, in wich of the two do I need to enter[/i] [b]80 - 80[/b] [i]and in wich of the two do I need to enter[/i] [b]43594 - 43594[/b] [b]2)[/b] [i]then as No-ip wich Type do I have to select:[/i] [b]DNS Host (A)[/b] [b]Port 80 Redirect[/b] [b]3)[/b] [i]In the Ip adress, should i enter my Ip adress or the adress of the Port forwarding?[/i]

item.title: Port forwarding and no-ip questions
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

thanks for answering.

Edit: 43594 needed to enter for all 4 (2 inbound, 2 private)?
or inbound the two 43594
and private the two 80

Read full topic

item.title: Port forwarding and no-ip questions
item.dc:creator: @Called_enzo Called enzo
item.description:
@Called_enzo wrote:

1 : 43594

2 : DNS

3 : the ip where ur internet is connected

Else use www.whatismyip.com

Read full topic

item.title: Port forwarding and no-ip questions
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

I’m trying to port forward, but from the port forwarding something isn’t clearly to me
1)

Inbound port Private port
[i]these two, in wich of the two do I need to enter[/i] [b]80 - 80[/b] [i]and in wich of the two do I need to enter[/i] [b]43594 - 43594[/b]

2) then as No-ip
wich Type do I have to select:
DNS Host (A)
Port 80 Redirect

3) In the Ip adress,
should i enter my Ip adress or the adress of the Port forwarding?

Read full topic
